Name: Midnight in New York
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The success of this cocktail is very dependent on the red wine you use. A lighter earthier style will work better than a voluptuous fruity red.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Trudy Thomas, Liquid Remedy Inc, Phoenix, AZ.
Nutrition: One serving of Midnight in New York contains 122 calories
